name: Shield Turret
desc: A manual shielded turret that can be deployed on most surfaces.

name: UAV
desc: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle that reveals enemy locations on the minimap.

name: RC-XD
desc: Remote-controlled car strapped with explosives.

name: Shock RC
desc: Detects nearby enemies and paralyzes them in a continuous electric shock.

name: Hunter Killer Drone
desc: Infantry deployed drone that seeks out an enemy or vehicle.

name: Care Package
desc: Call in a care pacakge containing one random scorestreak.

name: Counter UAV
desc: Jams enemy reconnaissance by temporarily disabling the enemy minimap.

name: SAM Turret
desc: The SAM Turret is an unmanned weapon that uses missiles to automatically lock onto and destroy hostile aircraft Scorestreaks.

name: MQ-27 Dragonfire
desc: Use a drone to detect and eliminate enemies while it has power and ammo. It carries 3 infrared explosive probes.

name: Guardian
desc: A deployable device that projects a cone of microwave radiation that slows enemies and dleas a small amount of damage.

name: Predator Missile
desc: Remote-controlled Predator Missile with a cluster bomb payload.

name: Wheelson
desc: A remote controlled ground drone with impressive firepower.

name: Sentry Gun
desc: An unmanned weapon capable of autonomously acquiring and firing upon enemy targets through thermal detection.

name: Strafe Run
desc: Calls in aerial support to strafe across a marked area with air-to-air firepower.

name: Hawk X3
desc: Manually controlled drone with a machine gun as the weapon.

name: Lightning Strike
desc: Launch a coordinated Lightning Strike on three locations.

name: XS1 Goliath
desc: Call in an XS1 Goliath to equip powerful armor and a minigun with limitless ammo.

name: Flamenaut
desc: Equip a heavily armored suit capable of unleashing hellfire on the battlefield with a powerful flamethrower.

name: Cluster Strike
desc: Bears down continuous missile bombardment to a designated location.

name: Orbital Laser
desc: A powerful orbital laser that shoots down from the sky and moves along the route specified by the player. The laser can penetrate roofed structures and buildings if enemies try to hide inside.

name: Napalm
desc: Scorch nearby enemies and fill the battlefield with smoke.

name: Stealth Chopper
desc: Call in an attacking helicopter to the battlefield for armed support.

name: Emergency Airdrop
desc: Call in three Airdrop supplies to your location.

name: EMP Systems
desc: Disables all enemy electronics. All items in enemy HUD will be removed and field of vision will be affected. Enemies affected cannot use throwables, Scorestreaks or Operator Skills.

name: Advanced UAV
desc: Orbital UAV that reveals the enemy's direction on the mini-map.

name: Swarm
desc: Call in a swarm of lethal Hunter Killer drones.

name: Chopper Gunner
desc: Fire from the skies in a chopper with a gun that has unlimited ammo. Careful not to overheat!

name: R.A.P.S.
desc: Deploy ship that drops autonomous Robotic Anti-Personnel Sentry drones.

name: VTOL
desc: Call in a VTOL gunship to provide air support.

name: Gunship
desc: A heavy assault gunship equipped with 3 different types of weapons.
